comment.author: 21647809@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/27331537@N06] My guess is that that the photograph was taken in the mid 1940s. The ferry wharves were transformed in the early 1940s (so was Manly Wharf in 1940-42) and the lack of traffic would indicate wartime austerity.

comment._content: nla.gov.au/nla.news-article18005181 here's March 1947. nla.gov.au/nla.news-article17976301 this report suggests construction might have started by ?mid 1946
